texts: Your application can take up to 10 working days to process - we'll contact you to let you know the outcome. In the meantime you need to pay the Congestion Charge if you drive within the zone.
The discount only applies to the Congestion Charge. If your vehicle does not meet the emission standards you still need to pay the ULEZ charge.
The 100% 9+ seater discount applies to Congestion Charging. Your vehicle is also subject to the T-Charge.
If your Congestion Charge discount application is accepted you will still need to pay the T-Charge to drive your vehicle in the Congestion Charging zone.
